sub_title: Market Researcher and Content Writer at Daedalean AI
summary:
Working on all levels including government level, global professional experience with an understanding of many cultures. Experienced negotiator. Strong communicating skills, both written and verbal. Working with people, helping and serving them is my passion and skill.

As a writer, I see my mission in carefully transferring the technical messages onto business soil without damaging the roots. Caring about the readers (investors, media, general public): cutting to the chase, presenting the concept clearly and concisely, and explaining how it is relevant to their business. Caring about the technical side: crafting the brand story without distorting or oversimplifying the ideas.

Skills:
— expertise in multicultural communication
— writing, editing and rewriting in order to produce clear and concise texts
— analytical skills: research, processing a large amount of complex information, summarizing, highlighting trends and providing insights
— facilitation of negotiations, team coaching

Several years of working in IT in various roles (business analyst, content marketing expert, investment writer and an organizational consultant). Having authored dozens of articles, presentations, white papers, pre-sale documents, and investment memos, I have a broad understanding of business issues and can quickly grasp the essence of many problems that a team can encounter.
